results.name: Binary encoding of 1-digits in ternary representation of A254103(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16384
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
program: A289813(n) = { my (d=digits(n, 3)); from digits(vector(#d, i, if (d[i]==1, 1, 0)), 2); } \\ From A289813
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 29 2018
